text: Diamonds is a British television drama produced by ATV for the ITV in 1981. Created by John Brason, the series was set amongst the exclusive world of diamond merchants, Coleman and Sons, in London and lasted for thirteen episodes. ==Cast== * Frank Coleman – John Stride * Margaret Coleman – Hildegard Neil * Bernard de Haan – Simon Ward * Dora Coleman – Doris Hare * Barry Coleman – Ian McCulloch * Joseph Coleman – Norman Wooland * Catherine Coleman – Shirley Cain * Terry Coleman – William Relton * Elaine Coleman – Briony McRoberts * David Kremer – Michael Culver * Mordecai Kremer – John Barrard * Jennifer Reece – Valerie Testa * Tom Fabricius – Mark Kingston ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width: 100%; margin- right: 0;" |- ! style="background: #15317E; color:#FFFFFF;" width: 5%| # ! style="background: #15317E; color:#FFFFFF;"| Title ! style="background: #15317E; color:#FFFFFF;"| Directed by ! style="background: #15317E; color:#FFFFFF;"| Written by ! style="background: #15317E; color:#FFFFFF;"| Original air date (UK) |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980s British drama television series Category:1981 British television series debuts Category:1981 British television series endings Category:1980s British television miniseries Category:Television shows produced by Associated Television (ATV) Category:Television shows set in London Category:English-language television shows
title: Diamonds (British TV series)
